description: This Java class represents a service layer component named UserService responsible for handling user management operations such as creating, reading, and updating users within a financial application, including integrations with Keycloak identity management and a banking core service.

classes.name: UserService
classes.description: Service class managing user-related operations, integrating with external systems like Keycloak and banking services, handling user creation, retrieval, and update workflows.

methods.name: createUser
methods.description: Creates a new user after validating email uniqueness and user existence in the banking system, then persists user data locally and in Keycloak.

methods.name: readUsers
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of users from the database, decorates user data with external identity info from Keycloak.

methods.name: readUser
methods.description: Fetches detailed user information by user ID from the local database.

methods.name: updateUser
methods.description: Updates user status and optionally enables the user in Keycloak based on provided update request.
